tool.name: Filter VCF
tool.command:
java -Xmx2G -jar ${GALAXY_ROOT_DIR}/tools/ngsep/NGSEPcore_3.3.2.jar FilterVCF
#if $d -d $d #end if #if $q -q $q #end if #if $minI -minI $minI #end if #if $minC -minC $minC #end if #if $minMAF -minMAF $minMAF #end if #if $maxMAF -maxMAF $maxMAF #end if #if $minOH -minOH $minOH #end if #if $maxOH -maxOH $maxOH #end if #if $maxCNVs -maxCNVs $maxCNVs #end if
$s $fi $fir $fia
#if $gc.gc_filter -g $gc.reference -minGC $gc.minGC -maxGC $gc.maxGC #end if
#if $functional.annotation #if $functional.gene -gene $functional.gene #end if #if $functional.roles -a $functional.roles #end if #end if
#if $region.select -$region.rs $region.loci #end if
#if $sample.select -saf $sample.saf $sample.fs #end if
$input > $output

param.name: d
param.label: Minimum distance between variants
param.help: if two variants are closer than this, both are removed

param.name: q
param.label: Minimium Quality to keep a call

param.name: minC
param.label: Minimum Coverage to keep a call

param.name: reference
param.label: Reference Genome
param.help: to calculate the GC content of the region surrounding the variant

param.name: minGC
param.label: Minimum percentage of GC-content
param.help: in the 100bp region surrounding the variant

param.name: maxGC
param.label: Maximum percentage of GC-content
param.help: in the 100bp region surrounding the variant

param.name: gene
param.label: Id of the Gene or the Transcript related with the variant

param.name: loci
param.label: File with the genomic regions to include/exclude

param.name: saf
param.label: File with the ids of the samples to include/exclude

param.name: minI
param.label: Minimum number of Individuals genotyped to keep a variant

param.name: maxCNVs
param.label: Maximum number of samples with CNVs

param.name: fir
param.label: Remove Invariant sites with the Reference allele

param.name: fia
param.label: Remove Invariant sites with the Alternative allele

tool.help:
**What it does**
This module implements different filters on VCF files with genotype information.
-----
**Input format**
Mandatory::
Input is a VCF file
Optional::
Reference genome: should be provided in FASTA format
Regions to select/filter out, text file with three columns: 1. sequence name (chromosome) 2. first position in the sequence 3. last position in the sequence *positions are assumed to be 1-based
Samples to select/filter out, text file with one line per sample: first column must be the sample id, other columns are ignored
-----
**Output format**
Writes a new VCF file only with the variants passing the filtering criteria.
The filtering order is as follows:
1. Distance filter (-d option), 2. Filters samples and genotypes (Samples from Population, Quality and -minC options), 3. Recalculates the number of samples genotyped, the number of alleles called and the MAF 4. Executes the remaining filters.
-----
.. class:: infomark
For details about this tool, please visit https://sourceforge.net/projects/ngsep/
